## Quick Summary: 📝
Opcode is a desktop application built with Tauri 2 that provides a GUI for managing Claude Code sessions and creating custom agents. It aims to bridge the gap between command-line tools and a visual experience for AI-assisted development, offering features like usage tracking, project management, and background agent execution.

## Key Takeaways: 💡

* ✅ Streamlined Claude Code workflow with a user-friendly GUI

* ✅ Effortless management of projects, sessions, and custom agents

* ✅ Comprehensive usage analytics dashboard for cost tracking and optimization

* ✅ Fast and responsive performance thanks to Tauri 2

* ✅ Enhanced development experience through intuitive interface and increased efficiency


## Project Statistics: 📊
* ⭐ **Stars:** 17428
* 🍴 **Forks:** 1290
* ❗ **Open Issues:** 220


## Tech Stack: 💻
- ✅ TypeScript


Tired of juggling multiple windows and command lines when working with Claude Code?  Wish there was a more intuitive way to manage your projects, agents, and sessions? Then get ready to meet Opcode, the revolutionary new GUI application built to supercharge your Claude Code workflow!  Opcode isn't just another pretty face; it's a powerful toolkit designed to streamline your entire AI-assisted development process. Forget about endless terminal commands and cryptic logs – Opcode provides a clean, user-friendly interface for everything you need.  Imagine effortlessly managing multiple Claude Code projects, each with its own session history and custom agents.  Opcode makes this a reality.  It's like having a dedicated command center for all your Claude Code activities, allowing you to focus on what truly matters: building amazing things.  At its core, Opcode is built on Tauri 2, guaranteeing a fast and responsive experience.  It handles everything from project organization and session management to creating and running custom AI agents.  This means you can create specialized agents tailored to specific tasks – imagine an agent for code generation, another for debugging, and yet another for testing. The possibilities are endless!  But it doesn't stop there. Opcode also includes a comprehensive usage analytics dashboard.  This lets you monitor your Claude API usage and costs in real-time, providing valuable insights into your development patterns and helping you optimize your spending.  You can even export this data for accounting purposes, making it a breeze to track expenses.  The visual charts and detailed breakdowns offer a comprehensive view of your Claude Code usage, enabling you to make informed decisions about your projects and resource allocation.  Opcode isn't just about efficiency; it's about enhancing your overall development experience.  By providing a unified and intuitive interface, Opcode eliminates the friction often associated with using large language models.  It empowers you to experiment more freely, explore new possibilities, and ultimately, become a more productive developer.  So, are you ready to take your Claude Code projects to the next level?  Opcode is the answer.  Give it a try – you won't be disappointed!
